section.title: Tutorial1: show all the gene identifiers and symbols of the genes in FlyMine
section.para: This page will guide you through the query: show all the gene symbols and identifiers of the genes in FlyMine. The aim of this query tutorial is to illustrate how use 'show' to select attributes to show in your results table. This query involves:

listitem.para: Selecting the Gene class from the 'Genomics' aspect.
Selecting the gene symbol and identifier fields to show in the output.
Navigate to the 'Genomics' aspect and click on the 'Gene' class under 'Query starting points'

The model browser will now be displaying the Gene class and it's fields. Navigate to the 'symbol' field and press show. Do the same for the 'identifier' field. The gene symbol and identifier fields will appear at the bottom of the query builder in the 'Fields selected for output' list. Note that these fields have also become highlighted in the model browser.
Press 'Show results' to display a table of gene identifiers and symbols:
